title: Introduction to React
description: Learn the fundamentals of React, including components, props, and state management.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript concepts like closures, promises, and async/await.

title: Three.js Fundamentals
description: Create stunning 3D graphics and animations in the browser with Three.js.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and practical applications.

title: Web Design Principles
description: Master the principles of good web design, including layout, typography, and color theory.

title: Node.js Backend Development
description: Build scalable backend applications using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
